overview: Queerography opens up this invisible continent. The heroes of the film live outside of Moscow and St. Petersburg, in large and small cities from Vladivostok to Kaliningrad and from Yakutsk to Sochi. Each episode shows a new city, the inhabitants of which for the first time tell their stories and let the authors of the film into their lives.
tagline: There are more than 10 million LGBTQ people in Russia â€” a gigantic community for which and about which almost nothing has been filmed.
title: Queerography. Novosibirsk
